title: I'm innocent, says South Africa's besieged Zuma
text:
I'm innocent, says South Africa's besieged Zuma 12:55pm EST - 01:51 
South Africa's President Jacob Zuma says he doesn't know why his ruling party is moving to depose him - but with anti-corruption raids on his friends and an imminent no-confidence vote, his days look numbered.   
South Africa's President Jacob Zuma says he doesn't know why his ruling party is moving to depose him - but with anti-corruption raids on his friends and an imminent no-confidence vote, his days look numbered.  //reut.rs/2EGuP9b
